head.title: World Briefing | Europe: Russia: Makes Florida Look Good

hedline.hl1: World Briefing | Europe: Russia: Makes Florida Look Good

abstract.p: Pres Vladimir V Putin appoints Aleksandr Khloponin acting governor of Krasnoyarsk, Siberia (S)

block.p: President Vladimir V. Putin ended -- sort of -- a series of strange events surrounding the gubernatorial election in Krasnoyarsk, Siberia, by appointing the winner acting governor. The Sept. 22 election, which a young former businessman, Alexander Khloponin, won, was annulled by the region's election commission. The annulment was dismissed by a court this week, but the commission responded by annulling the election again. Mr. Putin met with both candidates last night and appointed Mr. Khloponin acting governor.
